# device

**Instance Property**

The GPU device that indirectly owns the command buffer because you create it from a command queue the device also owns.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: any MTLDevice { get }
```

## Discussion

The command buffer can only work with other instances that [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer/device] creates, directly or indirectly, such as buffers and textures.

## Identifying the command buffer

- **label**: An optional name that can help you identify the command buffer.
- **commandQueue**: The command queue that creates the command buffer.
